notesStmt.note: "The obstinate lady" (p. 285), and "Trappolin creduto principe" (p. 411) each has special t.p.
Also issued as: Small poems of divers sorts, 1658; Poems, 1662; and Choice poems of several sorts, 1669.
Pages 279-305 photographed from Huntington Library copy and inserted at the end.
